name: ChlamydiaTrachomatisInfectionTestsForUnspecifiedChlamydiaSpeciesNucleicAcid
title: Chlamydia trachomatis Infection (Tests for unspecified Chlamydia species Nucleic Acid)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for lab test names to detect nucleic acids of unspecified Chlamydia species),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify laboratory tests names),(Inclusion Criteria: unspecified Chlamydia species),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
